Employment

2023
Thingsflow, Seoul, Korea
Freelancer Marketer
2020 - 2022
ED KPOP (Keens Academy), Seoul, Korea
Manager - Product Design & Marketing
Designed products (i.e., dance classes) for an online K-Pop learning platform where international K-Pop enthusiasts can learn dance, vocal, and fitness from industry professionals through either live-streaming or recorded-video classes.
Constructed product marketing strategies and social media content plans to meet business goals; set and achieved quantitative targets on annual budget and customer engagement on Twitter, TikTok, and Instagram.
2018 - 2019
Plan A Korea, Seoul, Korea
Producer, Assistant Director
Directed show flows, stage designs, media materials for BTS World Tour `Love Yourself'; Supervised production process with effective liaison among 100+ production crew in 12 cross-functional teams and third-party stakeholders.
Researched Japanese audience behavior by social media analysis and consulted on cultural context based on customer demography to maximize audience engagement in preparation for the Japanese edition of the world tour.
2015 - 2017
Ferrandi Paris, Seoul, Korea
Project Manager
